name: @tpmjs/tools-agentmail
description: AgentMail API tools for AI agents â€” create inboxes, send/receive emails, manage threads, drafts, and more

tools.name: createInbox
tools.description: Create a new email inbox for an AI agent with optional custom username and domain.

tools.name: listInboxes
tools.description: List all email inboxes in the AgentMail account with pagination support.

tools.name: getInbox
tools.description: Get details of a specific email inbox by its inbox ID.

tools.name: deleteInbox
tools.description: Delete an email inbox and all its messages permanently.

tools.name: sendMessage
tools.description: Send an email message from an inbox to a recipient with subject and body.

tools.name: replyToMessage
tools.description: Reply to an existing email message in a thread conversation.

tools.name: listMessages
tools.description: List email messages in an inbox with pagination support.

tools.name: getMessage
tools.description: Get the full details of a specific email message by its message ID.

tools.name: listThreads
tools.description: List email threads in an inbox, optionally filtered by labels.

tools.name: getThread
tools.description: Get a thread with all its messages for viewing a full conversation.

tools.name: createDraft
tools.description: Create an email draft for human-in-the-loop approval before sending.

tools.name: sendDraft
tools.description: Send a previously created draft, converting it to a sent message.
